title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: Get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Chat with local models from any Python script.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama. Works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama. Use any Ollama model as a LangChain LLM or chat model.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama. No API keys, 100% private, runs entirely in browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Simple, fluent API with reactive streams.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama. Idiomatic Ruby wrapper with streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI for Ollama with conversation history, prompt templates and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama. Use local models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host a Discord bot powered by any Ollama model. Slash commands & threads.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node to integrate Ollama models into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama. Supports .NET 6+ with async streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and model auto-pull.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama and run model tests.
